com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.registry

Class UIRegistryAmicableImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.registry.UIRegistry
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.registry.UIRegistryAmicableImpl

  • public class UIRegistryAmicableImpl
extends UIRegistry

    This UIRegistry implementation differs from the UIRegistryClassLoaderImpl in two ways.

    1. If the top level WComponent cannot be loaded, then an ErrorPage WComponent will be returned by getUI(String) instead of a null. The ErrorPage will be generated using the FatalErrorPageFactory.

    2. The ErrorPage WComponent will not be cached so that subsequent calls to getUI(String) will attempt to re-load the top level component.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Darian Bridge

      • getUI

        public WComponent getUI(String key)
        Retrieves the user interface that was registered with the given key. If the UI has not been registered, this attempts to load the UI using the key as a class name.
        Specified by:
        getUI in class UIRegistry
        Parameters:
        key - The registration key.
        Returns:
        the UI for the given key. The UI may be newly created.
